en.title: Deletion Assistant
en.description: Select services you no longer use and automatically generate data deletion requests (GDPR).
en.selectServicesTitle: üìã Select services you want to delete data from
en.selectServicesDesc: Check all services you no longer use and want to erase personal data from.
en.sortedByRisk: Services sorted by risk score (highest first)
en.deletionWarningTitle: Deleting your data is final and irreversible.
en.noInfo: We don't have precise instructions to delete data for this service.
en.modelInfo: This template includes references to GDPR articles to ensure proper handling of your request.
en.idRequired: An ID may be required for this request
en.treatedAll: You processed all selected services for data deletion.
en.nextStepsList2: Companies usually have 30 days to reply (GDPR)
en.nextStepsList4: If no reply, you can file a complaint with the data protection authority
en.bulkDeleteDesc: services selected from your risk analysis
en.loadFromProtectDataTitle: Load {count} service(s) from Protect My Data
en.errorLoadingProtectData: Error loading data from Protect My Data
en.tipAccountSettings: Check Account settings > Privacy or Security.
en.tipSearchEmail: Look for a contact email in the site's legal notice or privacy policy.
en.tipSendEmail: Try sending an email to privacy@..., dpo@... or contact@... using the service domain.
